metadata.description: Responsive Design PROJECT for multi-device optimization

success_criteria: Device Coverage: Works on {{DEVICE_COUNT}} target devices
Content Parity: All features available on all devices
Testing: Automated tests for all breakpoints
responsive_design_task_sequence: Device Audit: Analyze current state across devices (1-2 days)
Breakpoint Strategy: Define responsive system (1 day)
Component Adaptation: Make components responsive (3-4 days)
Layout Optimization: Improve layouts per device (2-3 days)
Performance Tuning: Optimize for mobile (2-3 days)
Cross-Device Testing: Validate on real devices (2-3 days)

project_specific: Test on real devices, not just browser DevTools
Consider touch, mouse, and keyboard inputs
Performance is part of responsive design
